data.actual_result: The cursor remains in the text box.
data.expected_result: The cursor should no longer be in the text box.
data.short_description: Cursor stays in the text box after "Slow Down" popup appears when sending friend requests too quickly.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the add friends tab - Search/send friend requests until the popup appears - Observe how the cursor remains in the textbox and you can type - Observe how when you hit enter, it not only closes the popup, but resubmits the friend request resulting in yet another popup
